root.string: This event breaks most of the rules for events in order to hack in the necessary functionality to detect nodes as they are crossed. This file shouldn't really be referenced when making your own toolkits, since it's really unconventional and sloppy

action.string: The last checkpoint to be successfully arrived at
Fires when at target waypoint, but only once per waypoint
Fires when at target waypoint for more than just the first tick

condition.string: Am I still at my last checkpoint?

action.string: Fires when at target waypoint for more than just the first tick
